definitions.definition: A developmental phase brought about by the action of hormones as part of the maturing process. For humans, there are three in total.

subdefinitions.definition: The process of sexual development that produces secondary sex characteristics and makes a person capable of reproducing sexually.

definitions.definition: The age at which a person is first capable of sexual reproduction .
The period when a plant begins to flower . (The addition of quotations indicative of this usage is being sought:)

main_definition: A developmental phase brought about by the action of hormones as part of the maturing process. For humans, there are three in total.
secondary_definitions: The age at which a person is first capable of sexual reproduction .
( botany ) The period when a plant begins to flower . (The addition of quotations indicative of this usage is being sought:)
